0 CLS:PRINT"WAIT...":CLEAR1500:DIMB$(255):MC=16384
10 FORT=0TO255:READA,B$(T):IFLEN(B$(T))<8THENB$(T)=RIGHT$("00000000"+B$(T),8)
11 NEXT

50 DATA0,0,1,1,2,10,3,11,4,100,5,101,6,110,7,111,8,1000,9,1001,10,1010,11,1011,12,1100,13,1101,14,1110,15,1111,16,10000
51 DATA17,10001,18,10010,19,10011,20,10100,21,10101,22,10110,23,10111,24,11000,25,11001,26,11010,27,11011,28,11100
52 DATA29,11101,30,11110,31,11111,32,100000,33,100001,34,100010,35,100011,36,100100,37,100101,38,100110,39,100111
53 DATA40,101000,41,101001,42,101010,43,101011,44,101100,45,101101,46,101110,47,101111,48,110000,49,110001,50,110010
54 DATA51,110011,52,110100,53,110101,54,110110,55,110111,56,111000,57,111001,58,111010,59,111011,60,111100,61,111101
55 DATA62,111110,63,111111,64,1000000,65,1000001,66,1000010,67,1000011,68,1000100,69,1000101,70,1000110,71,1000111
56 DATA72,1001000,73,1001001,74,1001010,75,1001011,76,1001100,77,1001101,78,1001110,79,1001111,80,1010000,81,1010001
57 DATA82,1010010,83,1010011,84,1010100,85,1010101,86,1010110,87,1010111,88,1011000,89,1011001,90,1011010,91,1011011
58 DATA92,1011100,93,1011101,94,1011110,95,1011111,96,1100000,97,1100001,98,1100010,99,1100011,100,1100100,101,1100101
59 DATA102,1100110,103,1100111,104,1101000,105,1101001,106,1101010,107,1101011,108,1101100,109,1101101,110,1101110
60 DATA111,1101111,112,1110000,113,1110001,114,1110010,115,1110011,116,1110100,117,1110101,118,1110110,119,1110111
61 DATA120,1111000,121,1111001,122,1111010,123,1111011,124,1111100,125,1111101,126,1111110,127,1111111,128,10000000
62 DATA129,10000001,130,10000010,131,10000011,132,10000100,133,10000101,134,10000110,135,10000111,136,10001000
63 DATA137,10001001,138,10001010,139,10001011,140,10001100,141,10001101,142,10001110,143,10001111,144,10010000
64 DATA145,10010001,146,10010010,147,10010011,148,10010100,149,10010101,150,10010110,151,10010111,152,10011000
65 DATA153,10011001,154,10011010,155,10011011,156,10011100,157,10011101,158,10011110,159,10011111,160,10100000
66 DATA161,10100001,162,10100010,163,10100011,164,10100100,165,10100101,166,10100110,167,10100111,168,10101000
67 DATA169,10101001,170,10101010,171,10101011,172,10101100,173,10101101,174,10101110,175,10101111,176,10110000
68 DATA177,10110001,178,10110010,179,10110011,180,10110100,181,10110101,182,10110110,183,10110111,184,10111000
69 DATA185,10111001,186,10111010,187,10111011,188,10111100,189,10111101,190,10111110,191,10111111,192,11000000
70 DATA193,11000001,194,11000010,195,11000011,196,11000100,197,11000101,198,11000110,199,11000111,200,11001000
71 DATA201,11001001,202,11001010,203,11001011,204,11001100,205,11001101,206,11001110,207,11001111,208,11010000
72 DATA209,11010001,210,11010010,211,11010011,212,11010100,213,11010101,214,11010110,215,11010111,216,11011000
73 DATA217,11011001,218,11011010,219,11011011,220,11011100,221,11011101,222,11011110,223,11011111,224,11100000
74 DATA225,11100001,226,11100010,227,11100011,228,11100100,229,11100101,230,11100110,231,11100111,232,11101000
75 DATA233,11101001,234,11101010,235,11101011,236,11101100,237,11101101,238,11101110,239,11101111,240,11110000
76 DATA241,11110001,242,11110010,243,11110011,244,11110100,245,11110101,246,11110110,247,11110111,248,11111000
77 DATA249,11111001,250,11111010,251,11111011,252,11111100,253,11111101,254,11111110,255,11111111

99 CC=1
100 FORT=1TO18:CLS0:FORY=0TO7:READA:FORX=1TO8:IFMID$(B$(A),X,1)="1"THENSET(X,Y,CC)
101 NEXT:NEXT
102 PRINT@256,;:INPUT"ENTER COLOR";CC:IFCC<0THENGOSUB200
103 NEXT:END

200 CC=ABS(CC):FORYY=0TO7:FORXX=0TO31:LPRINTCHR$(PEEK(32*YY+XX+MC));:NEXT:LPRINT:NEXT:LPRINT
210 RETURN

3500 DATA 255,255,255,255,255,255,255,255
